title: The global Zero trust security market size is expected to grow from an estimated value of USD 27.4 Billion in 2022 to USD 60.7 Billion by 2027, at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 17.3%
The global bio decontamination market is projected to reach USD 227 million by 2027 from USD 159 million in 2022, at a CAGR of 7.3% from 2022 to 2027
